channel.title: restores on Red Hat Telco Tigers Repository
channel.description: Recent content in restores on Red Hat Telco Tigers Repository

item.title: Backup Restore Etcd State
item.description: This article describes the steps necessary to backup and restore the etcd state on an OCP cluster. The article was written based on version 4.6 of OCP but is still relevent. There are also accompanying videos that show these processes. Backup and Restore of ETCD State
